mentoringRequestInfo.waitingOnMentor:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating the student is waiting for a mentor.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Info (status section, primary heading)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a mentoring request and is awaiting a mentor.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Waiting on a mentorâ€¦"
mentoringRequestInfo.waitingOnMentorQues:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a section providing information on making the most of mentoring.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Info (waiting box section, primary heading)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a mentoring request and is viewing the request details.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Waiting on a mentor?"
mentoringRequestInfo.howToGetMostOutOfMe:
**Functional Purpose**: Subheading prompting the user to learn how to optimize their mentoring experience.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Info (waiting box section, secondary heading)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a mentoring request and is viewing the request details.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Learn how to get the most out of mentoring"
mentoringRequestInfo.mentoringRelies:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory paragraph explaining the importance of shared understanding in mentoring.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Info (waiting box section, paragraph text)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a mentoring request and is viewing the request details.
**Technical Context**: Standard text, immediately followed by a Trans component with a link.
**Current English**: "Mentoring relies on mentors and students having a shared understanding of how it works."
mentoringRequestInfo.wantAFriend:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a section about private mentoring.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Info (direct mentoring section, primary heading)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a mentoring request and is viewing the request details.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Want a friend to mentor your solution?"
mentoringRequestInfo.sendThisLink:
**Functional Purpose**: Instruction for sending a private mentoring link.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Info (direct mentoring section, paragraph text)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a mentoring request and is viewing the request details.
**Technical Context**: Standard text, followed by a copy-to-clipboard button.
**Current English**: "Send this link to a friend for private mentoring."
mentoringRequestInfo.newWindowOrTab:
**Functional Purpose**: Alt text for an external link icon, indicating that the link opens in a new browser window or tab.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Request Info (video component, external link icon alt text)
**When Users See This**: When a video link is present, or when hovering over the external link icon (if applicable).
**Technical Context**: This text is used as the `alt` attribute for an `Icon` component. It should describe the icon's function for accessibility.
**Current English**: "The link opens in a new window or tab"
